1.Title: Changing Tides
1.Description: Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases all squad members' Impact by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
